Zergling/Oinker/Rhinox/Sniper/Scorponok/Bacterium/BH/Blastrage


  Zergling and Oinker walks into the alliance base. Zerlging said to 
the pig-bot, "Go check the scanners." Oinker looked at the Fuzor, 
"Scanners, how does yo' read scanners." Zergling couldn't believe his 
ears, this bot didn't know how to read scanners, "idiot." Oinker 
slowly pulled out a pistol, "Me, an idiot, I'll Murder yo'" Zergling 
then pointed to the Scanners, "they work by Tracking bot near the 
stalte dish, blah blah blah." Oinker put away his pistol, "Oh okay,
ah 
see now, now hoof it away." Zergling looked at Oinker, "Why." Oinker 
started to laugh, "Fastess gun in th' west, ah reckon. No joke." 
Zergling heard enough and headed for his room.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Rhinox heard that they were moving, "What about sniper's things, when 
he gets back, how will he know thyat we moved."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Sniper yelled at the Predacon base again. "Hellbeast, I must talk to 
you, It will help you win the Beast Wars."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Scorponok sat in his lab. He prgramed all of the stuff and was ready 
to do something else. He walked out of the lab and headed for 
Megatron, He wanted to go to Darkmouse, but he knew that they could 
not show there felling public. "Megatron, any order, maybe even with 
Darkmouse." He knew Megatron wouldn't let him go near Darkmouse, but 
an order is an order.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Bacterium stood next to amobeous, "Alright we in bot mode now what."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
BH and Blastrage entered their ship. They went to the CR chamber and 
heal themselves.
